Content: [ Carmen confronts Donald Trump about the misinformation he spews in his campaign for president. He isnt even quite sure about how much he is worth. However, he tells her one thing that is absolutely true, and it is scary. Could he actually be a serious candidate for the Republican nominee in the 2016 presidential election?]
Author: [ Scott Stantis]
Title: [ Prickly City: The one thing Trump is right about will terrify you]
